price: Iyo biza kuba bityo (bakoze ibyo basabwa), rwose twari kubaha ingororano zihambaye ziduturutseho,
arabic: وَإِذٗا لَّأٓتَيۡنَٰهُم مِّن لَّدُنَّآ أَجۡرًا عَظِيمٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhan laātaynāhum min ladunnā ajran ʿaẓīman
